Description: Bright and spacious 3-bed, 2 bath, 1,650 sf lower unit in 2-family. Tucked away on quiet dead-end road backing on to pond, but close to transportation and major routes. Local schools are Bowen (ES), Oak Hill (MS), and Newton South (HS). Walk to Wegmans, Bloomingdale's, Chestnut Hill Mall, The Square, The Street, Lifetime, Starbucks etc. Chestnut Hill MBTA Green Line station is 1.2 miles away.
